      • inheritAttribute

        public void inheritAttribute(Attribute a)
        Inherits the given attribute. If already inherited, then the attribute values are combined
        Parameters:
        a - the attribute to inherit

      • inheritAttributes

        public void inheritAttributes(Item other)
        Inherits all attributes of the given item. Any duplicates combine their values
        Parameters:
        other - the item to inherit attributes from
